mapper.select: SELECT c.CLUB_IDX, m.MEMBER_EMAIL, c.CLUB_NAME, c.CLUB_DATE, c.CLUB_MEETDATE, c.CLUB_STATE, o.CODE_CODENAME as 지역, d.CODE_CODENAME as 대면유무 from club c LEFT JOIN code o ON c.CODE_IDX = o.CODE_CODE and o.CODE_UPCODE = 'region' left join code d on c.CLUB_ONOFF = d.CODE_CODE and d.CODE_UPCODE = 'onoff' LEFT JOIN member m ON m.MEMBER_IDX = c.MEMBER_IDX order by CLUB_IDX DESC;

SELECT c.CLUB_CONTENT, c.CLUB_NUM, c.CLUB_IDX, m.MEMBER_EMAIL, c.CLUB_NAME, c.CLUB_DATE, c.CLUB_MEETDATE, c.CLUB_STATE, o.CODE_CODENAME AS 지역, d.CODE_CODENAME AS 대면유무 FROM club c LEFT JOIN code o ON c.CODE_IDX = o.CODE_CODE AND o.CODE_UPCODE = 'region' LEFT JOIN code d ON c.CLUB_ONOFF = d.CODE_CODE AND d.CODE_UPCODE = 'onoff' LEFT JOIN member m ON m.MEMBER_IDX = c.MEMBER_IDX WHERE c.CLUB_IDX = #{CLUB_IDX} ORDER BY CLUB_IDX DESC
